duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support to the technology department and assist with hardware and software deployment.
Assist in new hire processing and perform basic software troubleshooting and hardware triage support.
Handle equipment and set-up for conference/meeting facilities and provide off-site support for client functions/meetings.
Perform administrative tasks such as moving and delivering equipment to clients and changing passwords.
Respond to customer inquiries concerning support requests, systems status, and network connectivity.
Resolve hardware and software problems for firm-standard hardware/software and maintain inventory, including software and documentation upgrades, distributions, and licenses.
Coordinate, track, and process firmwide requests for software and documentation and make recommendations to management regarding update and maintenance processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Certifications preferred)
